name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searchmate - new tab with clock & alarm

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to enhance your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the current time and date with a changing background gradient. with a multi search engine Search bar that enables you to search at websites you might be using often right from the new tab.

Now it also has alarm clock, timer & countdown-timer to boost up your productivity with alarm tone.
